title: Self-Directed Learning Design Workshop for Pre-Service Medical Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories in medical education and secondary education experience
context.additional_context: Short-Intensive Course for Aspiring Medical Professionals to Develop Self-Directed Learning Capabilities Through Structured Independent Learning Tasks

learning_goals: Learners can apply five self-directed learning strategies (e.g., goal setting, resource exploration, time management) to practical tasks
Learners demonstrate self-directedness by completing structured independent learning tasks in mobile environments at 80%+ rates
Learners can evaluate learning outcomes from three or more perspectives while sharing feedback with peers
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
